name: Lost and Found - GGJ 2021
description:
You play as Lost and Found unit 371 (space ship) that must find and collect scrap to upgrade ship components. When you are strong enough you must defeat Montpellier (the boss ship). 

The game was made during GGJ 2021. We have no plans to update the game for further updates. We are keeping it as a game jam only.

Daniel Paine - Programming

Ben Hopkins - Art

Martin Voskanian - Music
